This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

This is a snack or discretionary food which tends to be high in saturated fat and/or added sugars, added salt or alcohol and low in fibre and/or protein. We recommend moderating intake according to nutritional guidelines.

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

Nutritional guidelines recommend consuming 2-3 serves of dairy foods (cheese, yoghurt, milk or alternatives) per day. Please note that this food is high in fat. Fat can affect gut motility and when consumed in excess can be an additional symptom trigger.
